solution_line_template: Paul has {total_weeknight_homework} hours of homework from weekdays because {hours_per_weeknight} x {weeknights_in_week} = <<{total_weeknight_homework}={total_weeknight_homework}>>{total_weeknight_homework}
He has {available_homework_nights} days to do his homework because {days_in_week} - {practice_nights} = <<{days_in_week}-{practice_nights}={available_homework_nights}>>{available_homework_nights}

He needs to do {average_hours_per_night} hours a night because {total_homework_hours} / {available_homework_nights} = <<{total_homework_hours}/{available_homework_nights}={average_hours_per_night}>>{average_hours_per_night}
